othello.view

Class GameFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • othello.view.GameFrame

  • public class GameFrame
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton class that contains the main GUI of the Game. The frame should should only be created once and reachable from the controlling GameManager, which is the reason to why it is a singleton object.
